content.text: Hey, I'm bored, what should I do today?
I like to geocache in my free time, you should give it a try!
Really? I've never heard of that.
It's a real fun activity that gets you outdoors and exploring your surroundings. You use a GPS device to find hidden containers with clues inside. It's like a treasure hunt!
That sounds really cool, I'll have to look into it.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I've found some really cool places while geocaching.
You know, I have a bunch of old GPS devices that I could use.
That's awesome! You can definitely get started with those.
Great! I'll go look for them.
Alright, let me know if you have any questions.
